tool_description: An API that provides the latest news articles on Environment impact and climate change across the globe.
name: Environment News Live
title: Environment News Live

api_list.name: Get Climate news from Individual media sources
api_list.description:
Get climate/environment news from a particular news channel. Endpoint -> /news/{newspaperID}
Get newspaperID from a news publisher list by hitting the endpoint ->  /newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://environment-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/timesofindia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "environment-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://environment-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "environment-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All the news articles related to climate
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the news related to Climate change across the globe. Endpoint -> /news

api_list.name: Get list of news publishers
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a list of all the newspapers from which data is being scraped. You can use this to fetch data from a particular newspaper or from all. Endpoint -> /newspapers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://environment-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/newspapers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "environment-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
